name: Neko Neko
description:
Introduction

This is a casual intellectual game that can be easily played, your goal is to swap the fragments to restore the pictures.

There is no time or star limit in the game, you are supposed to enjoy the relaxing experience.

Together the full picture of all the lovely cat ladies with your own hands, collect their portraits. Hope you have a relaxing and enjoyable game time:)

Features

  • Nice CG
  • Funny gameplay
  • Relaxing music
  • CG gallery
  • Interesting level challenges

The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
